column4: not tried it but you can try something like this "dd if=/dev/hdc of=/dev/stdout | scp /dev/stdin user@host:/directory"
i need to backup my laptop hda1 so there won't be space to store the iso before it get's copied to my server. will boot from live cd.
my example does not try to store anything on your disk. but i'm not sure if it will work though
